Feature - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK
Contains the data and the description of the data exported by the node

Feature.ExtractResult - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK
class used for return the data and the number of bytes read
Feature.FeatureListener - Interface in com.st.BlueSTSDK
Interface used for notify that the feature updates its data
Feature.FeatureLoggerListener - Interface in com.st.BlueSTSDK
This class permit to dump the feature data, both in raw format (the same that that we receive from the node) and after that we parse it
Feature.Sample - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK
class that contains the last data from the node

FeatureLogCSVFile - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Log

FeatureLogDB - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Log
Store the feature data into a Db in ram, the data can be exported in a csv file when the logging is finished
FeatureLogDB(Context, List<Feature>) - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Log.FeatureLogDB

FeatureLogDBOpenHelper - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Log
create the db where store the feature data, each feature will have a different table with the table

FeatureMemsSensorFusion - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features
This feature will contains the quaternion compute in the device using the sensor fusion algorithm (gyroscope + accelerometer + magnetometer).
FeatureMemsSensorFusion(Node) - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureMemsSensorFusion
build a Mems sensor fusion feature
FeatureMemsSensorFusion(String, Node) - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureMemsSensorFusion
create a feature that export the quaternion data with a different name
FeatureMemsSensorFusionCompact - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features
this feature manage the quaternion data in the compact way, in this package the quaternion component are encoded using a int16 with 5 decimal values, and sent in group of 2-4 quaternions
FeatureMemsSensorFusionCompact(Node) - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureMemsSensorFusionCompact
